analysis: Market analysis indicates negative pressure with sellers in control. RSI at 24.55 signals oversold conditions, potential reversal opportunity. Money Flow Index at 24.75 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD histogram negative with bearish crossover in effect. Price extended above Bollinger upper band, reversal risk elevated. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias.
